Tweet.Author: Bary Nusz
Tweet.Notes: Lack of rain dropped Lake Texoma by 6 ft

Tweet.Author: Matt Kurvin
Tweet.Notes: Surfing at Mavericks, solid 15 ft with a couple 18, 20 ft sets

Tweet.Author: J Tower
Tweet.Content: Beautiful day! The perfect weather to ride my bike to the office.
Tweet.Notes: Been on the Hart-Montague Trail State Park bike trail?

Tweet.Author: Conan O'Brien
Tweet.Content: A publisher just asked me to write my autobiography, but they want it to be about Johnny Depp.
